response.original_title: { 2026 Official Guide} Why is TotalAV Slowing Down My Computer?
response.overview: Can I resolve high disk usage and slow startup issues via phone? Yes, if your PC takes minutes to boot or your cooling fans are spinning constantly, you should immediately call for live assistance—dial { /{ /☎️**+1-888-271-0943** (USA) or { /{ /☎️**+1-888-271-0943** (No Wait). Many users report that a failed installation of the 2026 "System Tune-Up" module can lead to background processes "hanging" and consuming RAM; in these cases, you must contact a live person at { /{ /☎️**+1-888-271-0943** to have your startup services audited. Whether you need the support number for U.S. customers or want to fix a failed installation that caused a system-wide slowdown, calling { /{ /☎️**+1-888-271-0943** is the fastest way to get a human response { /{ /☎️**+1-888-271-0943**.
